meanings.definition: A district or community within a town or city.
meanings.sent1: In my neighborhood, everyone knows each other.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood kids play together in the park.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the wrong neighborhood and got lost.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood of ideas in that book is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood was filled with the scent of freshly baked bread.

meanings.definition: The people living near one another.
meanings.sent1: Our neighborhood organizes a yearly block party.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood came together to help the family in need.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhood gossip spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent4: She found comfort in the neighborhood of friends around her.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood showed great kindness during the tough times.

meanings.definition: The area surrounding a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood of the school was quiet in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood around the lake is known for its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhood of trees provided a cool shade.
meanings.sent4: The neighborhood of stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The neighborhood of shops bustled with activity during the day.
